description: Identifies unusual iediagcmd child process, which may be an indicator of malicious activity.
author: shahirahbar
name: Suspicious IEdiagcmd Child Process (via cmdline)
query: process where (event.category : "process" and (process.parent.executable : "*iediagcmd.exe" and process.executable : ("*route.exe", "*netsh.exe", "*ipconfig.exe", "*dxdiag.exe", "*conhost.exe", "*makecab.exe")) and not process.executable : ("*system32*", "*syswow64*"))
